name: Generator Escape
description:
You have been kidnapped by robots in a star wars like world, fight your way out of a plasma factory and escape through a stolen starship! Shoot your way through an army of enemies or use your lightsaber to cut through them and controll time in a super hot style mechanic to truly feel like a sci - fi samurai

This is a 10 week independant collage project

Controlls:

Use W A S D to move and mouse to look around

press 1 to select the plasma rifle and shoot with left mouse button and press 3 to equip the light saber

you can only slow down time when holding the lightsaber, to do so hold right mouse button

This game has a timer and is great for speedrunning, using the slow down time mechanic slows down your timer so you dont have to worry about it getting in the way of a good run.
